name: 2DShooter_
description:
For this project we had to create a 2d shooter with 3 changes.

My changes were the following

Endless mode- A mode where the enemies dont stop and you struggle to stay alive

Spawner- i added the spawner from my previous project and had them spawn the enemies

Rotate- i added a rotate script from my previous project so the spawners rotate around an empty. this keeps them from spawning in a single point and is more difficult to spawn camp
